entry.title: DNS seeds unstable
entry.summary: The conversation in the given context is regarding a test conducted on the website testnet-seed.bluematt.me. The result of the test shows that the website does not connect on port 18333. The author of the message, Matt Corallo, finds this strange and asks for more information such as the time of the test and if anyone else can reproduce the same results. Andreas Schildbach, the sender of the original message, confirms that the website is working fine but only returns one node. The conversation ends with a promotional message for a Selenium testing platform called SauceLabs.
